languages.text: "На помощь! Саботаж, покушение, Вольный Торговец в крови!"
"Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"
languages.original_text: "На помощь! Саботаж, покушение, Вольный Торговец в крови!"

traits.locale_text: "Help! Sabotage! Attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! {mf|He|She}'s drenched in blood!"
"Help! Sabotage! Attempt on the Rogue Trader's life! {mf|He|She}'s drenched in blood!"

"Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"

languages.text: « À l'aide ! Alerte ! Quelqu'un a essayé de tuer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! {mf|Il|Elle} est {mf|couvert|couverte} de sang ! »
languages.original_text: "Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"

traits.locale_text: « À l'aide ! Alerte ! Quelqu'un a essayé de tuer {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! {mf|Il|Elle} est {mf|couvert|couverte} de sang ! »

languages.text: «¡Ayuda! ¡Alerta! ¡Alguien ha intentado matar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Está cubiert{mf|o|a} de sangre!».
languages.original_text: "Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ayuda! ¡Alerta! ¡Alguien ha intentado matar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Está cubiert{mf|o|a} de sangre!».

languages.text: “快来人啊！出事了！有人打算杀害行商浪人！{mf|他|她}浑身上下都是血！”
languages.original_text: "Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"

traits.locale_text: “快来人啊！出事了！有人打算杀害行商浪人！{mf|他|她}浑身上下都是血！”

languages.text: 「助けてください！危険です！ローグトレーダーを殺そうと試みた人がいます！ {mf|彼|彼女}、血まみれです！」
languages.original_text: "Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"

traits.locale_text: 「助けてください！危険です！ローグトレーダーを殺そうと試みた人がいます！ {mf|彼|彼女}、血まみれです！」

languages.text: "Hilfe! Gefahr! Jemand hat versucht, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu töten! {mf|Er|Sie} ist voller Blut!"
languages.original_text: "Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"

traits.locale_text: "Hilfe! Gefahr! Jemand hat versucht, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu töten! {mf|Er|Sie} ist voller Blut!"

languages.text: "Yardım edin! İmdat! Biri Hür Tacir'i öldürmeye çalıştı! Şu an kanlar içinde!"
languages.original_text: "Help! Danger! Someone's tried to kill the Rogue Trader! {mf|He|She}'s covered in blood!"
